about.summary: A library to identify devices (phones, tablets) and their capabilities by parsing (browser/HTTP) user agent strings

name: user-agents
raw_recipe:
{%set name = "user-agents" %}
{%set version = "1.0.1" %}
{%set hash_type = "sha256" %}
{%set hash_val = "b5976d971e9e55ec8d80f6c6428f6de5de1467844a0d37184b5ee5e40929e939" %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  {{ hash_type }}: {{ hash_val }}

build:
  skip: True  # [py35]
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record=record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools

  run:
    - python
    - ua-parser >=0.4.1

test:
  imports:
    - user_agents

about:
  home: https://github.com/selwin/python-user-agents
  license: MIT
  summary: 'A library to identify devices (phones, tablets) and their capabilities by parsing (browser/HTTP) user agent strings'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - pmlandwehr
